title: Ping and FPS are perfect; Game is still lagging
body: My ping and Fps are perfectly fine, but the game is lagging like hell for me. It doesn't disconnect me, but character models slide all over the place, auto attack animations don't show, HP erratically falls without explanation, the works. Can someone explain what is going on?

replies.body: Same issue here, I don't even want to call it "lagging" because my ping and INTERNET is FINE. The game is just so delayed it's unplayable.
